question: Which of the following are the techniques for detection of cancer of internal organs?
(a) Radiography, MRI
(b) MRI, computed tomography
(c) Widal test, radiography
(d) MRI, widal test
explanation: Radiography (X-rays), CT (Computed Tomography), and MRI are standard techniques for detecting cancers of internal organs. The Widal test is used for diagnosing Typhoid.
